description: News about Indian Point Nuclear Power Plant (NY), including commentary and archival articles published in The New York Times.
title: Indian Point Nuclear Power Plant (NY)
title_page: Indian Point Nuclear Power Plant (NY) - The New York Times
maintext:
Fire Prompts Renewed Calls to Close the Indian Point Nuclear Plant
Officials at Entergy, the company that operates the plant, said they were working with the State Department of Environmental Conservation to contain a spill and to clean it up.
